content: happy may day p pick up a pocket penguin - for free … in other words - happy may #freebeefridayknits 1 say hello to this cute little penguin using my yarn black/ white/ yellow stash - i d love me and you to knit a bigger one with chunkier yarn - one day maybe and - for the first time i ve embroidered eyes - so no scrabbling and searching to find the right size toy eyes enjoy him - this little fellow has got bags of character - he s knitted almost as one - joining as you go - only the happy feet are sewn on afterwards and he does enjoy a little splash about hence the water pic - so if you d like to work a little more with the shaping then go ahead - wet and shape oh yes - i will also have a making-up video tutorial for this on my blog - dotpebbles blogspot com should you want to make along with me join along with my other knitted creatures - ranging for beginner s bunny with complete novice tutorial to much more complex knits - try out my barn owl or my cat 1 https //www instagram com/dotpebbles_knits/
